name: Fruit Salad Project
short_description:
This project is a being worked on by a single college student from the UK and has been in progress since September 2012.

This engine is aimed at making it easier to create complex games through simply creating the game objects and tying them all together with the game levels through a sophisticated internal messaging system. Unique objects behavior can be tied in through a unique script language provided with the engine.

I welcome anyone to use my engine as they wish provided that they give credit where credit is due, and I even encourage others to send me a message if they believe they can make certain pieces more efficient/safer/user friendly/stomp out bugs/etc.
